title: Hello World!

content: AbstractWelcome to my website! This is the first post, and I hope it marks the beginning of a vibrant journey for both you and me. English will be the primary language used here, but I may occasionally provide additional explanations in Chinese.ArticleHello World!Here is a test of mathmode:\[\int_{\partial A}\mathbf{\omega} =\int_A \mathrm d \mathbf{\omega}\]This is called Stokes’ theorem.(Well, it is 3:16 a.m. and i’m totally awake due to some unexpected errors occur.)
